item.title: [Sebastian Koothottil] Physics of Soul | ആത്മാവിന്റെ ഭൗതികം - സെബാസ്റ്റ്യൻ കൂത്തോട്ടിൽ - essentia'18
item.description:
The existence of a soul or athma is being questioned with help of known fundamentals of Physics here by Mr. Sebastian Koothottil. This talk was organised by esSENSE Club as a part of its annual knowledge fest 'essentia'18' which was held at VJT Hall, Thiruvananthapuram on 18th and 19th of October 2018
ആത്മാവ് എന്ന സങ്കല്പത്തെ ഭൗതിക ശാസ്ത്ര നിയമങ്ങളിലൂടെ തെളിയിക്കാനോ തള്ളിക്കളയാനോ സാധിക്കുമോ എന്ന് പരിശോധിക്കുന്നു ശ്രീ സെബാസ്റ്റ്യൻ കൂത്തോട്ടിൽ ഈ അവതരണത്തിലൂടെ. 2018 ഒക്ടോബർ 18,19 തീയതികളിൽ തിരുവനന്തപുരം വി ജെ ടി ഹാളിൽ വെച്ചു എസ്സെൻസ് ക്ലബ് സംഘടിപ്പിച്ച വാർഷിക വിജ്ഞാനോത്സവം 'എസ്സെൻഷ്യ'18' എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ ഭാഗമായി നടത്തിയ അവതരണം.

item.title: [Dr. Dileep Mampallil] Are we Alone | നാം തനിച്ചാണോ - ഡോ.ദിലീപ് മമ്പള്ളിൽ - essentia’18
item.description:
Are we alone in this universe or will there be a possibility of life’s existence outside our home, the Earth. Dr. Dileep Mampallil gives all the answers in a simple yet detailed fashion through this talk titled ‘Are we alone’. This talk was organised by esSENSE Club under the annual knowledge fest 'essentia'18' which was held at VJT Hall, Thiruvananthapuram on 18th and 19th of October 2018
ഈ വിശാലമായ പ്രപഞ്ചത്തിൽ ഭൂമിയിലുള്ളത് പോലെ ജീവൻ മറ്റൊരിടത്തുണ്ടാകാൻ സാദ്ധ്യതകൾ എന്തൊക്കെയാണ്. അങ്ങനെ ഉണ്ടെങ്കിൽ അത് നമ്മൾ കണ്ടെത്തുന്നതെങ്ങനെ എന്നിങ്ങനെയുള്ള അതി നിഗൂഡമായ ചോദ്യങ്ങൾക്കു വിശദവും ലളിതവുമായ ശൈലിയിൽ നമുക്ക് മറുപടി തരുന്നു ഡോ.ദിലീപ് മമ്പള്ളിൽ 'നാം തനിച്ചാണോ' എന്ന ഈ അവതരണത്തിലൂടെ. 18 ,19 ഒക്ടോബർ 2018 ന് എസ്സെൻസ് ക്ലബ് തിരുവനന്തപുരം വി ജെ ടി ഹാളിൽ വെച്ചു സംഘടിപ്പിച്ച വാർഷിക വിജ്ഞാനോത്സവം 'എസ്സെൻഷ്യ'18' എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ ഭാഗമായി നടത്തിയ അവതരണം.
#essentia18 This event essentia'18 was organised by esSENSE Club
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/
Subscribe to esSENSE Club Youtube channel now. Click here to subscribe https://goo.gl/gnGn2P

item.title: [Aparna] Onion | അൻയൻ - അപർണ essentia'18
item.description:
Aparna gives a breif description on how some countries became successful and how others could not even though they had advantages on their side. This talk was organised by esSENSE Club under the annual knowledge fest 'essentia'18' which was held at VJT Hall, Thiruvananthapuram on 18th and 19th of October 2018
അൻയൻ - അപർണ ഈ വിഡിയോയിൽ എങ്ങനെ ചില രാജ്യങ്ങൾ അഭിവൃദ്ധിപ്പെട്ടു എങ്ങനെ മറ്റു പല രാജ്യങ്ങളും പുരോഗതി കൈവരിക്കുന്നതിന് പരാജയപ്പെട്ടു എന്ന് പരിശോധിക്കുന്നു. 18 ,19 ഒക്ടോബർ 2018 ന് എസ്സെൻസ് ക്ലബ് തിരുവനന്തപുരം വി ജെ ടി ഹാളിൽ വെച്ചു സംഘടിപ്പിച്ച വാർഷിക വിജ്ഞാനോത്സവം 'എസ്സെൻഷ്യ'18' എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ ഭാഗമായി നടത്തിയ അവതരണം.
#essentia18 This event essentia'18 was organised by esSENSE Club
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/
Subscribe to esSENSE Club Youtube channel now. Click here to subscribe https://goo.gl/gnGn2P

item.title: [Geordie George] Visudhapapangal - Reloaded | വിശുദ്ധപാപങ്ങൾ റീലോഡഡ് - ജോർഡി ജോർജ് - Bhauthikam'19
item.description:
Detailed narration of the immoral indocrinations of the Bible and the ugly side of the church. The talk was held under the event 'Bhauthikam'19' organised by the esSENSE Club at the Univeristy Students Centre, Thiruvananthapuram on 27 January 2019.
വിശുദ്ധ ബൈബിളിന്റെ അവിശുദ്ധതയും സഭയുടെ വൈകൃതങ്ങളും വിശദമായി അവലോകനം ചെയ്യുന്നു ശ്രീ. ജോർഡി ജോർജ് ഈ വിഡിയോയിൽ. എസ്സെൻസ് ക്ലബ് സംഘടിപ്പിച്ച ഭൗതികം'19 എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ ഭാഗമായി 27 ജനുവരി 2019 ന് തിരുവനന്തപുരം യൂണിവേറിസ്റ്റി സ്റ്റുഡന്റസ് സെന്ററിൽ വെച്ച് നടത്തിയ അവതരണം.
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links
https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/

https://goo.gl/gnGn2P

item.title: [Dr R. Sharmila] Democratic System and Women|ജനാധിപത്യ വ്യവസ്ഥയിലെ സ്ത്രീ - ഡോ. ആർ ഷർമിള - ഭൗതികം'19
item.description:
In this video Dr. R. Sharmila is discussing about the status and the space woman occupy under the system of democracy. The talk was held under the event Bhauthikam'19 which was organised by Essense Club Trivandrum unit on 27 January 2019 at the University Students Centre Thiruvananthapuram.
ജനാധിപത്യ വ്യവസ്ഥയിലൽ സ്ത്രീയുടെ ഭാഗവും ഭാഗധേയവും ചർച്ച ചെയ്യുന്നു ചെയ്യുന്നു ഡോ. ആർ. ഷർമിള ഈ വിഡിയോയിൽ. ഭൗതികം'19 എന്ന ഏകദിന സെമിനാറിന്റെ ഭാഗമായി 2019 ജനുവരി 27 ന് തിരുവനതപുരം യൂണിവേഴ്സിറ്റി സ്റ്റുഡന്റസ് സെന്ററിൽ വെച്ച് നടന്ന പ്രഭാഷണം.

item.title: [Dr. C Viswanathan] Misogyny & Sexism | ഡോ. സി. വിശ്വനാഥൻ - സ്ത്രീവിരുദ്ധത : സിദ്ധാന്തവും പ്രയോഗവും
item.description:
In this video Dr. C. Viswanathan explains how misogyny and sexism acts in tandem to enforce and maintain patriarchal norms and expectations in the society. The talk was held at University Students Centre, Thiruvananthapuram on 27 January,2019 as a part of the one day seminar program Bhauthikam'19.
പുരുഷാധിപത്യ പ്രത്യയശാസ്ത്ര സിദ്ധാന്തങ്ങൾ സമൂഹത്തിൽ നടപ്പിലാക്കാൻ മിസോജിനിയും സെക്സിസവും എങ്ങനെയാണ് പരസ്പര സഹായകങ്ങളായി പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നത് എന്ന് ഡോ. സി. വിശ്വനാഥൻ ഈ പ്രഭാഷണത്തിൽ വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു.
ഭൗതികം'19 എന്ന ഏകദിന സെമിനാറിന്റെ ഭാഗമായി 2019 ജനുവരി 27 ന് തിരുവനതപുരം യൂണിവേഴ്സിറ്റി സ്റ്റുഡന്റസ് സെന്ററിൽ വെച്ച് നടന്ന പ്രഭാഷണം.

item.title: [Dr. Veena J. S] Abortion & Contraception :Women's Rights | ഗർഭഛിദ്രം/ നിരോധനം-സ്ത്രീയുടെ അവകാശങ്ങൾ
item.description:
In this video, Dr. Veena J. S is discussing about the body autonomy of women and the rights they possess with respect to abortion and contraceptive methods which are assured to them by the law of the land.
The session was held under the event essentia'18 held at VJT Hall, Thiruvananthapuram on October 18 &19, 2018.
എസ്സെൻഷ്യ'18 ന്റെ ഭാഗമായി ഒക്ടോബർ 18 നടന്ന ഈ സെഷനിൽ സ്വന്തം ശരീരത്തെ സംബന്ധിച്ചുള്ള തീരുമാനങ്ങൾ എടുക്കാനുള്ള സ്ത്രീകളുടെ സ്വാതന്ത്ര്യം, ഗർഭഛിദ്രം/ഗർഭനിരോധനം എന്നിവയിൽ സ്ത്രീയുടെ അവകാശങ്ങൾ, അത് ഉറപ്പിക്കാൻ സഹായിക്കുന്ന നിയമങ്ങൾ എന്നിവയെ പറ്റിയാണ് ഡോ. വീണ.ജെ.എസ് സംസാരിക്കുന്നത്.
#essentia18
This event essentia'18 was organized by esSENSE Club
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links
https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/
Subscribe to esSENSE Club Youtube channel now.
Click here to subscribe
https://goo.gl/gnGn2P

item.title: [Infoclinic] - Medical quacks and placebo | ഇൻഫോക്ലിനിക്‌ - ചികിത്സാരംഗത്തെ ഒടിയന്മാർ at essentia'18
item.description:
Part 2 of the session ' Open forum with Infoclinic' conducted on October 19th 2018 at essentia'18 - esSENSE Club Annual Fest, Thiruvananthapuram.
In this video, Infoclinic team doctors answers to questions about alternative medicines, naturopathy, homeo and other exponents of pseudo sciences.
എസ്സെൻഷ്യ '18 ന്റെ ഭാഗമായി തിരുവനന്തപുരം വി ജെ ടി ഹാളിൽ ഒക്ടോബർ 19 ന് നടന്ന ഓപ്പൺ ഫോറം വിത്ത് ഇൻഫോക്ലിനിക്‌ എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ രണ്ടാം ഭാഗം.
പാരമ്പര്യ/പ്രകൃതി ചികിത്സാ സംബ്രദായങ്ങളെയും ഹോമിയോ മുതലായ ഇതര വൈദ്യശാസ്ത്ര സഖാക്കളെ കുറിച്ചും വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു ഇൻഫോക്ലിനിക്‌ ഡോക്ടർമാർ ഈ വിഡിയോയിൽ.
#essentia18 This event essentia'18 was organized by esSENSE Club
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/
Subscribe to esSENSE Club Youtube channel now. Click here to subscribe https://goo.gl/gnGn2P

item.title: [Dr. Jinesh P S] Rudrakshamahathmyam | ഡോ. ജിനേഷ് പി. എസ് - രുദ്രാക്ഷമാഹാത്മ്യം at Spark'18
item.description:
Dr Jinesh P.S is discussing about the adverse effects and methods to resist the growth in popularity of Pseudo Science based medicines in our society. This session was conducted at Spark'18, an esSENSE Club Ernakulam Event. Spark'18 was held at at Mahakavi G Hall, Ernakulam on the 22nd of April 2018.
2018 ഏപ്രിൽ 22ന് എസ്സെൻസ് എറണാകുളം സംഘടിപ്പിച്ച സ്പാർക്'18 എന്ന ഏകദിന സെമിനാറിൽ കപട വൈദ്യം സമൂഹത്തിൽ ആഴത്തിൽ വേരോടുന്ന സാഹചര്യത്തെയും അതിന്റെ അപകടത്തെയും, അതിനെ ചെറുക്കാനുള്ള വഴികളെയും വിശകലനം ചെയ്യുന്നു ഡോ.ജിനേഷ് പി. എസ് ഈ വിഡിയോയിൽ.

item.title: [Maithreyan] Sexuality and Privacy - മൈത്രേയൻ - ലൈംഗികത സ്വകാര്യമായത് എങ്ങനെ - essentia'18
item.description:
ലൈംഗികത എന്നത് മനുഷ്യൻ സ്വകാര്യമായി ആസ്വദിക്കുന്ന ഒന്നാണ്. എന്നാൽ എന്നുമുതലാണ് മനുഷ്യൻ മറ്റു മൃഗങ്ങളെക്കാൾ കൂടുതൽ അത് സ്വകാര്യമായി സൂക്ഷിക്കാൻ തുടങ്ങിയത് എന്ന് മൈത്രയൻ വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു ഈ വീഡിയോയിൽ.
എസ്സെൻഷ്യ18ൻറെ ഭാഗമായി നടന്ന 'മൈത്ര്യനോടൊപ്പം ഒരു സായാഹ്നം' എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ രണ്ടാം ഭാഗം.
Sexuality is one thing which is enjoyed by humans in privacy. But since when did humans begin to keep it more private than other species on earth. Maithreyan discusses about the evolution of aspect of privacy in human sexuality.
This is the second part of the session 'An evening with Maithreyan' held under he event essentia'18 at VJT Hall Thiruvananthapuram on October 18, 2018.
#essentia18
This event essentia'18 was organized by esSENSE Club
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links
https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/
Subscribe to esSENSE Club Youtube channel now. Click here to subscribe https://goo.gl/gnGn2P

item.title: [Retheesh Krishnan] Nunayanmare Nunachikale | നുണയന്മാരേ നുണച്ചികളേ -രതീഷ് കൃഷ്ണൻ at Spark '18
item.description:
In this talk made during the program SPARK '18 conducted by esSENSE Ernakulam on 22 April 2018, Mr. Retheesh Krishnan discusses about the science behind lies told by people. What prompts us to tell lies and what are the activities that happen in our brain while we tell lies etc are explained in detail in this informative session.
22 ഏപ്രിൽ 2018 ന് എസ്സെൻസ് എറണാകുളം സംഘടിപ്പിച്ച സ്പാർക് '18 എന്ന പരിപാടിയിൽ ശ്രീ. രതീഷ് കൃഷ്ണൻ മനുഷ്യർ നുണ പറയുന്നതിനെക്കുറിച്ചും നുണ പറയുമ്പോൾ മസ്തിഷ്കത്തിൽ ഉണ്ടാകുന്ന പ്രക്രിയകളെക്കുറിച്ചും വിശദമായി പ്രതിപാദിക്കുന്ന അവതരണം.
This event Spark '18 was organized by esSENSE Club on 22 April 2018 at Ernakulam
To know more about esSENSE Club, please visit the following links https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/

item.title: [Infoclinic] Fever & Paracetamol - ഇൻഫോക്ലിനിക്‌ - പനിയും പാരസെറ്റമോളും - essentia'18
item.description:
Part 1 of the session ' Open forum with Infoclinic' conducted on October 19th 2018 at essentia'18 - esSENSE Club Annual Fest, Thiruvananthapuram.
In this video, Infoclinic team doctors answers to questions about fever and clarifies the truth behind criticisms about paracetamol.
ഓപ്പൺ ഫോറം വിത്ത് ഇൻഫോക്ലിനിക്‌ എന്ന പരിപാടിയുടെ ആദ്യ ഭാഗം.
പനിയെ കുറിച്ചുള്ള സംശയങ്ങളും പാരസെറ്റാമോളിനെ കുറിച്ചുള്ള തെറ്റിദ്ധാരണകളെയും വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു ഇൻഫോക്ലിനിക്‌ ഡോക്ടർമാർ ഈ വിഡിയോയിൽ.
#essentia18 This event essentia'18 was organized by esSENSE Club

item.title: [Dr. Deepu Sadasivan] - "Dr Google" | "ഡോക്ടർ ഗൂഗിൾ" - ഡോ. ദീപു സദാശിവൻ - Swathanthrachintha'18
item.description:
ഇന്റര്‍നെറ്റ് മൂലം സാധാരണ ജനങ്ങൾക്ക് ആരോഗ്യശാസ്ത്രത്തെപറ്റി പ്രത്യേകിച്ച് രോഗങ്ങളേപറ്റിയും ചികിത്സകളേപറ്റിയും മരുന്നുകളേപറ്റിയും വളരെയധികം വിവരങ്ങൾ വിരല്‍ തുമ്പില്‍ ലഭ്യമാകുന്ന അവസ്ഥ യുടെ ഗുണദോഷങ്ങളെ പറ്റി ഡോ.ദീപു സദാശിവൻ ഈ പ്രഭാഷണത്തില്‍ വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു
In this talk Dr. Deepu Sadasivan discusses the pros and cons of large mass of information on health sciences especially diseases treatment and medicines available at finger tip for the general public because of internet.
item.itunes:author: Source Author
item.itunes:summary:
ഇന്റര്‍നെറ്റ് മൂലം സാധാരണ ജനങ്ങൾക്ക് ആരോഗ്യശാസ്ത്രത്തെപറ്റി പ്രത്യേകിച്ച് രോഗങ്ങളേപറ്റിയും ചികിത്സകളേപറ്റിയും മരുന്നുകളേപറ്റിയും വളരെയധികം വിവരങ്ങൾ വിരല്‍ തുമ്പില്‍ ലഭ്യമാകുന്ന അവസ്ഥ യുടെ ഗുണദോഷങ്ങളെ പറ്റി ഡോ.ദീപു സദാശിവൻ ഈ പ്രഭാഷണത്തില്‍ വിശദീകരിക്കുന്നു
In this talk Dr. Deepu Sadasivan discusses the pros and cons of large mass of information on health sciences especially diseases treatment and medicines available at finger tip for the general public because of internet.

item.title: [Jagan George] Homo Economicus | ഹോമോ എക്കോണൊമിക്കസ് -ജഗൻ ജോർജ് --Swathanthrachintha'18
item.description:
ഒരു രാജ്യത്തിന്റെ പുരോഗതിയും അഭിവൃദ്ധിയും ഒക്കെ നിശ്ചയിക്കുന്നതു് ആ രാജ്യത്തിന്റെ സാമ്പത്തിക മൂലധനത്തേക്കാൾ ആ രാജ്യത്തു നിലനിൽക്കുന്ന അസമത്വത്തിന്റെ തോതാണു്.
A country's progress and welfare is determined more by the level of inequality existing in that country than by the economic capital the country has.
Speaker: Jagan George Event: Swathanthra Chintha 2018 conducted by esSENSE Club Venue: Students Centre, PMG, Trivandrum, Kerala Date: 20 September 2018
https://www.essense.club https://www.facebook.com/essense.club/ https://twitter.com/esSenseClub https://www.instagram.com/essenseindia/

item.title: ഒന്നാം പ്രതി നെഹ്രു | Nehru, The First Accused - Part 1 - Ravichandran C
item.description:
The right wing parties and academicians in India are, now a days, after Mr Jawaharlal Nehru who was the first prime minister of the country hailed as the architect of modern India. He is portrayed as 'the first accused' and the principle reason behind many troubles and debacles the country encountered and currently suffering from.They say that Nehru committed many historic blunders in his 17 year long rule. Ravichandran looks into the major right wing allegations against Nehru in an objective fashion and restores him to the right place he belongs in the political history of India.
Presentation by Ravichadran C on 13/10/2018 at Town Hall , Thalassery ,Kannur. Program named 'Curious'18' organized by esSENSE Global Kannur

item.title: കുമ്പസാരം എന്ന വാരിക്കുഴി By Linton Thomas
item.description:
The christian’s ticket out of hell is dissected in this informative presentation by Linton Thomas. If you have a family that goes to confession, please do yourselves a favour and watch this talk. A royal commission is considered to be Australia’s highest form of formal inquiry. The commission into child sexual abuse discovered that abuse took place most commonly in religious institutions (reported by 58.1% of survivors). The commission recommended that child sexual abuse disclosed during a religious confession should be reported. But the church is fiercely fighting this reform and once again, decided to be on the wrong side of history.
Presentation was conducted by esSSENSE Melbourne on 23/07/2018 @ Chambly Hall Camberwell, Melbourne.

item.title: ശാസ്ത്രവും തത്വചിന്തയും | Science and Philosophy - Mohamed Nazeer
item.description: Mohamed Nazeer in this presentation at the one-day seminar 'Enlight 18' organised by esSENSE Kannur at the Police Society Hall in Kannur on April 8, 2018 argues that philosophical problems highlighted by philosophy as a discipline have been rendered irrelevant by science as a way of knowledge that seeks to provide more accurate knowledge about the universe, reality and human nature. item.title: Vattolimarude Chiri - വട്ടോളിമാരുടെ ചിരി - Presentation by Linton Thomas
item.description:
Presentation by Linton Thomas exposing the quackery committed by Catholic faith healers. The audience is taken through the history of charismatic healing, its foothold in various countries and how the priests/ pastors exploit the ignorance and blind Faith of the believers into convincing them of miracles. In this hilarious speech, Linton makes the audience laugh and think at the same time, of the hidden dangers these practices pose to our society.
Audiovisual content from MM TV Ltd. is being used for educational purposes 17:31 - 18:08

item.title: Debate: Is organic farming a threat to food safety? - Dr K.M. Sreekumar V/s Illias K.P
item.description:
Debate: Is organic farming a threat to food safety സംവാദം : ജൈവ കൃഷി ഭക്ഷ്യ സുരക്ഷയ്ക്ക് ഭീഷണിയോ? Dr. K.M. Sreekumar V/s Illias K.P
രാസവസ്തു എന്ന വാക്ക് ഇരുപത്തിയൊന്നാം നൂറ്റാണ്ടിൽ മലയാളിയുടെ പേടിസ്വപ്നമാണ്. മലയാളിയെ സംബന്ധിച്ച് കീടനാശിനിയും രാസവളവും ഭക്ഷണത്തിൽ കലർത്തുന്ന വിഷങ്ങളുടെ പര്യായമാണ്. കേരളത്തിൽ വർദ്ധിച്ചുവരുന്ന കാൻസർ എന്ന വിപത്തിന്റെയും മറ്റനേകം ആരോഗ്യ പ്രശ്നങ്ങളുടെയും മൂലകാരണം ഈ രാസപദാർത്ഥങ്ങളാണെന്ന് വിശ്വസിക്കുന്നവരാണ് ബഹുഭൂരിപക്ഷവും. ജൈവകൃഷിയാണ് ഈ പ്രശ്നങ്ങൾക്ക് പരിഹാരം എന്നത് ഏകദേശം കേരളത്തിന്റെ പൊതുബോധമായിരിക്കുന്നു എന്ന് പറയാം.
അതേസമയം നൂറ്റാണ്ടുകളായി പട്ടിണിമരണങ്ങളും പോഷകാഹാരക്കുറവും നിരന്തരം വേട്ടയാടിയിരുന്നു ഒരു ജനത ഇന്ന് ആസ്വദിക്കുന്ന ഭക്ഷ്യ സുരക്ഷയും സമൃദ്ധിയും ശാസ്ത്രീയ കൃഷിരീതിയുടെ ഉത്പന്നങ്ങളാണെന്ന വാദം മറുവശത്തുനിന്ന് ഉയരുന്നു.. കഴിഞ്ഞ നൂറ്റി ഇരുപത് വർഷങ്ങളിൽ ലോക ജനസംഖ്യ ഏഴിരട്ടിയോളം വളർന്നപ്പോഴും ആ വർധനക്ക് ആനുപാതികമായി കൂടുതൽ കൃഷിയിടങ്ങൾ (വനനശീകരണത്തിലൂടെ) വെട്ടിത്തെളിച്ചെടുക്കാതെ നിലവിലുള്ള ഉള്ള കൃഷിയിടങ്ങളുടെ ഉത്പാദന ക്ഷമത വര്ധിപ്പിച്ചാണ് പ്രധാനമായും ലോകരാജ്യങ്ങൾ ഭക്ഷ്യ ഉത്പാദനത്തിൽ കുതിച്ചുചാട്ടം കൈവരിച്ചത്. ജൈവകൃഷി എന്ന പേരിൽ നടപ്പാക്കുന്ന അശാസ്ത്രീയ കൃഷിരീതികൾ ഭക്ഷ്യസുരക്ഷക്ക് ഭീഷണിയാണെന്ന് ഈ ഭാഗം വാദിക്കുന്നു.
എന്താണ് യാഥാർഥ്യം? ഭക്ഷ്യ സുരക്ഷക്ക് നമ്മൾ കൊടുക്കുന്ന വിലയാണോ നമ്മുടെ ആരോഗ്യം? ജൈവകൃഷിയെ പ്രതിനിധീകരിച്ച് ഈ സംവാദത്തിൽ പങ്കെടുക്കുന്നത് കേരളം ജൈവ കർഷക സമിതി ജോയിന്റ് സെക്രട്ടറി ശ്രീ ഇല്ല്യാസ് K.P. ശാസ്ത്രീയ കൃഷിരീതികളുടെ പിന്തുണച്ച് സംവാദത്തിൽ പങ്കെടുക്കുന്നത് കേരള കാർഷിക സർവകലാശാലയിലെ അസ്സോസിയേറ്റ് പ്രഫസർ Dr K.M ശ്രീകുമാർ.

item.title: ഒരു ഗുളികയുടെ കഥ - Prof. Aravind K. | Oru Guligayudey Katha
item.description:
ഒരു ഗുളികയുടെ കഥ Oru Guligayudey Katha
In this talk Prof. Aravind K. talks about how a drug is developed and marketed in the industry.
Starting with the basic drug action mechanism, he covers the various aspects related to drug designing.
Program named ELAN'17 was conducted by esSENSE Ernakulam Unit at IMA Hall, IMA House, Ernakulam on 23/12/2017.

item.title: പ്രപഞ്ചവും ദൈവവും (God & Universe) - Sebastian Koothottil
item.description:
Talk by Sebastian Koothottil, a research scholar at Calicut university, at Town hall Ernakulam on 02/10/2017. The two day National seminar 'essentia17' conducted by esSENSE Club in connection with esSENSE annual fest. " പ്രപഞ്ചത്തിനു തുടക്കമുണ്ടോ? തുടക്കമുണ്ടെങ്കില്‍ കാരണം ആവശ്യമുണ്ടോ എന്നീ ചോദ്യങ്ങളെയും പ്രപഞ്ചത്തിലെ സാഹചര്യങ്ങള്‍ ജീവന് അനുയോജ്യമായ രീതിയില്‍ fine tuned ആണെന്നും അത് ദൈവത്തിന്‍റെ അസ്തിത്വത്തിനു തെളിവാണ് എന്നുമുള്ള വാദങ്ങളെയും ഭൗതിക ശാസ്ത്രത്തിന്‍റെ അടിസ്ഥാനത്തില്‍ പരിശോധിക്കുന്നു.
esSENSE Social links: Website of esSENSE: http://essenseglobal.com/ Website of neuronz: www.neuronz.in FaceBook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/esSENSEGlobal/ FaceBook Page of esSENSE: https://www.facebook.com/essenseglobal/ FaceBook Page of neuronz: https://www.facebook.com/neuronz.in/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/esSENSEGlobal Podcast: http://podcast.essenseglobal.com/

" പ്രപഞ്ചത്തിനു തുടക്കമുണ്ടോ? തുടക്കമുണ്ടെങ്കില്‍ കാരണം ആവശ്യമുണ്ടോ എന്നീ ചോദ്യങ്ങളെയും പ്രപഞ്ചത്തിലെ സാഹചര്യങ്ങള്‍ ജീവന് അനുയോജ്യമായ രീതിയില്‍ fine tuned ആണെന്നും അത് ദൈവത്തിന്‍റെ അസ്തിത്വത്തിനു തെളിവാണ് എന്നുമുള്ള വാദങ്ങളെയും ഭൗതിക ശാസ്ത്രത്തിന്‍റെ അടിസ്ഥാനത്തില്‍ പരിശോധിക്കുന്നു.

item.title: Debate - Patriotism Vs Nationalism | Ravichandran C, Rahul Eashwar, VK Prasad, Dr E Balakrishnan
item.description:
This is a panel discussion on Patriotism Vs Nationalism conducted by the Government Model Engineering College, Ernakulam and esSENSE Club on 6.10.17 as a part of EXCEL-17 celebration at the college open auditorium.
Noted Malayalam author Ravichandran C, social activist Rahul Eshwar, VK Prasad (Editor, Dehabhimani Daily), Dr E Balakrishnan (historian) participated in the debate which was moderated by noted Television anchor Arun Kumar K .

item.title: Yoga Debate|സംവാദം: യോഗ ഉത്തമവ്യായാമമോ? 'Is Yoga an ideal exercise?'' Ravichandran C Vs Yogi Shivan
item.description:
This debate on the utility of Yoga as an exercise(Is Yoga an ideal exercise?) between noted Malayalam authour Ravichandran C and Yoga guru Mr Sivan was conducted by esSENSE Kollam on 27.8.17 at YMCA, Hall, Kollam, Kerala, India.
Ravichandran explained that Yoga was not really an exercise as it was meant in the first place by sage Patanjali in Yogasutra.
Mr Shivan opposes the arguments by citing his personal experience and untrustworthiness of books.
The debate was moderated by Mr Shivadasan P.V

item.title: The New Age of Reason- Ravichandran C at Public Library Hall, Guruvayoor, Thrissur on 3.9.17
item.description:
യുക്തിയുടെ നവയുഗം : This presentation on 'The New Age of Reason' done by noted Malayalam authour Ravichandran C at Public Library Hall, Guruvayoor, Thrissur on 3.9.17. The program was conducted by esSENSE, Chavakkad, Thrissur & Progress UAE Chapter.
The Speaker here evaluates the influence of scientific knowledge and rationalism throughout the world over the past 25 years, scope and reversals.

item.title: മാലാഖമാരുടെ വിലാപം -The Lamentation of Angels- Ravichandran C
item.description:
This is a talk by noted authour Ravichandran C at Government Polytechnique, West hill, Calicut, Kerala on 12.8.2017.
The speech was on the recently concluded Nurses' strike in Kerala, in July, 2017. The speaker observes that the inherent gender bias in Kerala is deeply related to the overdose of religiosity. Hailing Nurses as 'angles' is a tricky ploy to deprive them of the basic human rights and wages.
Nurses are not angels, they are human beings with equal status, so they should be treated accordingly. Later, Ravichandran fielded questions from the audience.
The programme was conducted by Freethinkers Network Group, Calicut.

item.title: ശാസ്ത്രത്തിന്‍റെ നിരാകരണം (The Negation of Science) Reloaded - Ravichandran .C
item.description:
This is a presentation made by the noted Malayalam authour Ravichandran C (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Ravichandran) at Grameena Vayanashala hall Kanayannur Chottanikkara, Ernakulam, Kerala on 04/06/2017.
This is the reloaded version of the previous presentation with the same title by him at Bangalore on 19.3.17. Through this presentation Ravichandran C attempts to explain how Kerala society negated the positive values and functional criteria science stands for and embraced illusory equations of pseudo science, quackery, religious fanaticism. Science is the best way to do any thing in this world, whether it is art, sex or war. It is not a thing that produced in laboratories. It is a way of thinking and processing data based on evidence and logic. Scientific temper and scientific knowledge are two different thing. Any one can improve scientific knowledge by collecting more facts and figures. One needs not be a scientist to be scientific and being a scientist does not guarantees that one is scientific, says Ravichandran.

item.title: Meriyuday Cake മേരിയുടെ കേക്ക് - Ravichandran C
item.description:
This presentation on organic farming was done by noted Malayalam authour Ravichandran C (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Ravichandran) at Sahithya Academy Hall, Thrissur, Kerala, India on 3.5.17.
Ravichandran says that many of the foundation principles of various practices of organic farming prevalent in Kerala are unscientific and retrogressive. The policy efforts to go for full scale organic farming by the state government would put the already declining agriculture of Kerala on further back foot, he argues.
The event was conducted by esSENSE, Thrissur.

item.description:
This is a presentation done by noted authour Ravichandran C ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Ravichandran ) . at Public Library Hall, Kollam on 28/05/2017. Here, the speaker evaluates the merits of various theological arguments in favour of the existence of the so called super natural entities like god, cosmic power...etc in a hilarious manner. The event was by conducted by esSENSE, Kollam.

item.title: Ravichandran C @ Perth, Australia
item.description:
"Relevance of secularism in Indian Society" (ഇന്ത്യന്‍ സമൂഹത്തില്‍ മതേതരത്വത്തിന്റെ പ്രസക്തി - രവിചന്ദ്രന്‍ സി) - a talk by the Indian author, free thinker Ravichandran C(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Ravichandran). This talk was organized by Navodaya, Perth, as one of the 8 talks done by the writer across Australia, in a first of it's kind visit, coordinated by seSENSE, Melbourne, Australia during April -May, 2017. We deeply regret that we are not able to upload the Q & A session of this programme due to some technical glitches.

item.title: വാട്‌സാപ്പ് വിജ്ഞാനകോശം- ഡോ ആല്‍ബി ഏലിയാസ്‌ (Whatsapp Encyclopedia by Dr. Alby Elias)
item.description:
Whatsapp Encyclopedia (വാട്സാപ്പ് വിജ്നാനകോശം) , a talk by Dr. Alby Elias. In the digital age we have a vast ocean of knowledge at our fingertips. As responsible netizens many of us feel obliged to share this knowledge, either because we like sharing or to keep ourselves relevant. In this talk organised by Essense Melbourne, the presenter tries to analyse the many facets of forwarded messages.

item.title: ആദാമിന്‍റെ പൊക്കിള്‍ (The Navel of Adam) - Ravichandran.C
item.description:
This is a presentation done by noted author Ravichandran C (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Ravichandran) at Brothers Auditorium, Alleppey, Kerala on 10th June 2017 at 10 am on the evolution of human beings. This event was conducted by the District Committee of Kerala Sasthra Sahithya Parishath. Here, Ravichandran, who translated the Greatest Show on Earth by Richard Dawkins into Malayalam (Bhoomiyile Ettavum Mahathaya Drishya Vismayam/DC, Books, Kottayam, 2012) examines the claims of biblical creationism in the backdrop of the theory of Evolution by means of Natural selection.

item.title: ജൈവകൃഷി ശാസ്ത്രീയമോ? | Is Organic Farming Scientific? - Ravichandran C V/s Kiran K Krishna
item.description:
This debate 'IS ORGANIC FARMING SCIENTIFIC?' between Ravichandran C and Kiran K Krishna was organized by esSENSE, Trivandrum at Hassan Maryakkar Hall, Palayam, Trivandrum, India on 21.6.17 @5 Pm in connection with the release of the book, CARTERUDE KAZHUKAN: Sampoorna Jaiva krishy-Sadhythayum Sadhuthayum'(Malayalam/DC books , Kottayam) written by Ravichandran C and Dr KM Sreekumar. Here, Ravichandran advocates for integrated nutrient management and pest control and good agricultural practices whereas Kiran K Krishna, while rejecting many organic farming techniques prevalent, alleges that the over use of pesticides is good enough reason for going for full scale organic farming in Kerala.

item.title: Piety Is Material Addiction - Ravichandran.C ഭക്തി = ഭൗതികാസക്തി | Bhakthi = Bowthikaasakthi
item.description:
This is a presentation done by noted writer Ravichandran C (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Ravichandran) at Valancherry, Malappuram dist, Kerala, India. The event held at Co-operative Bank Auditorium, Valancherry at @ pm on 14.5.2017 was conducted by 'Manava Swathanthra Chintha Vedhi'. Here the speaker states that the religious craze of those who pose to be pious and claim to know and feel what others can not, is, in reality, shameless beggars seeking material benefits for personal aggrandizement @ 24x7. He terms the so called spiritualists as defeated believers who are worse than religious zealots.

item.title: ഇടതുപക്ഷം ഹൃദയപക്ഷം - Dr.Retheesh Krishnan
item.description:
Dr.Retheesh Krishnan here talks about the bird's eye view of the origins or asymmetry in human body, and discusses why heart is more towards left of the human body in majority of the case. The two day programme named 'Charvakam2017' organised by 'Yukthivadha Padna Kendram' on 20/05/2017 & 21/05/2017 at Town Hall, Ernakulam, Kerala

item.title: മതം തിന്നുന്ന മനുഷ്യര്‍ (RELIGIOVORES) - Ravichandran .C
item.description:
This is the inauguration speech done by noted Malayalam author and freethinker Ravichandran C in the Annual District conference of Kerala Shasthra Sahithya Parishath at Govt HSS Parashala, Thirupanathapuram on 8.4.17. Ravichandran here talks about the fast spreading darkness in the society of Kerala due to increasing rate of religiosity and anti-science campaigns. KSSP has big role to play in redeeming the situation. But, whether the required effort is generated is a compelling question to ponder over, says the speaker. Ravichandran calls upon all the progressive forces in Kerala to unite to thwart the looming threat of caused by the snowballing theocratization of the body politic.

item.title: Pinnottodunna Malayali - പിന്നോട്ടോടുന്ന മലയാളി Ravichandran C @Melbourne, Australia
item.description:
Pinnotodunna Malayalee' by noted Malayalee author and free thinker Ravichandran C. where he talks about why Malayalees are, in some aspects, taking steps backwards than progressing forward.
This event was organised by Essense Melbourne. Conducted on the 29th of April, 2017 at Banyule Theatre, Melbourne, it was one of the 7 talks across Australia in a first of it's kind tour by a Malayalee intellectual.
The event kicks off with the presentation of the author's new work - Velichapaadinte Bharya, followed by the talk and a Q&A session at the end.

item.title: മൃത്യുവിന്‍റെ വ്യാകരണം (The Grammar of Death) - Ravichandran C
item.description:
This Presentation was done by noted Malayalam Writer and Freethinker Ravichandran C at enLIGHT' 17, a one day science seminar conducted by the esSENSE, Kannur on 2.4.17 at Shishak Sadan, Kannur. Ravichandran here explores the two important scientific explanations associated with the question 'why do we die?' and its possible connotations. He begins the discussion citing the glorious fight made by Dr Randy Pausch, Associate Professor, Carnegie Mellon University, USA against pracreatic cancer in 2009. Ravichandran himself wrote a book in Malayalam on Randy and his famous 'last lecture' which was published by DC Books Kottayam, under the title' Mrithyuvinte Vyakaranam' ie (the Grammar of death).

item.title: മാധ്യമങ്ങളും ജനാധിപത്യവും - Mohamed Nazeer
item.description:
Kerala-based Journalist Mohamed Nazeer in this presentation on 'Media and Democracy' at a seminar titled 'Enlight 17' organised by the esSENSE Kannur Chapter in Kannur on April 2, 2017 examines how a growing political correctness culture promoted in the contemporary Left liberal milieu is endangering free speech which is a key Enlightenment value that sustains independent media and democracy.

item.description:
Media and social critic Sebastian Paul, BJP leader Anjana Suresh, writer J Reghu and social critic P M Ayoob attended the discussion. Rationalist C Ravichandran was the moderator.
This debate was the first event of the esSENSE-Times of India Debate series-2017 conducted from 5.4.17 to 7.4.17 at 5 pm-8pm at Hassan Maraykkar Hall, Palayam Trivandrum.

item.title: Brain Matter (From LGBTQ to Autism) - Ravichandran C
item.description:
Noted Malayalam authour and freethinker Ravichandran C is here talking about the neurological orientations behind physical and behavioural conditions in human beings. He examines the fundamental issues related to gender matrix and autism in particular. This event was conducted by the Department of Chemistry, TKM Arts and Science College, Nangayarkulangara, Alleppy, Kerala as a part of two day national seminar in the college on 28/02/2017

item.title: Debate:Swami Chidanandapuri V/s Ravi Chandran C ഭഗവത്ഗീത ജാതിവ്യവസ്ഥയെ പിന്തുണയ്ക്കുന്നുവോ ?
item.description:
This debate was the concluding event of the esSENSE-Times of India Debate series-2017 conducted from 5.4.17 to 7.4.17 at 5 pm-8pm at Hassan Maraykkar Hall, Palayam Trivandrum.
Noted Malayalam writer and freethinker Ravichandran C and renowned spiritualist and head of Adwaita Asram, Kolathur, Calicut, Swami Chidanandapuri are debating the question,
''Does Gita endorse Caste System?'' here.
This is the second straight debate between them in the span of last 12 months. The last one was on Vedanta at Ernakulam.
This debate was conducted by esSENSE and the Times of India news paper, sponsored by INSPIRIT academy, Trivandrum.

item.title: ശാസ്ത്രത്തിന്‍റെ നിരാകരണം (The Negation of Science) - Ravichandran .C
item.description:
This presentation was done by noted freethinker and authour Ravichandran C at Karunya Auditorium, KR Puram, Banglore on 18.3.17. The event was conducted by esSENSE, Bangalore. Ravichandran here talks about how Kerala society negated the positive values and functional criteria science stands for so as to embrace illusory equations of pseudo science, quackery, religious fanaticism. Science is the best way to do any thing in this world. It has the best possible methodology and code of conduct. It is descriptive rather than prescriptive and take a stand of moral neutrality. But that won't make society robotic or inhuman. Because, essentially, man is a moral animal. To be a scientific human being means you are not only scientific but also moral. Science also calls for the updation of social morality as per requirements. But, at present, eating the fruits of science and cutting its roots is the favourite past time of Keralites. The Speaker would like to see light at the end of the tunnel. That is possible only if the society begins to adopt the scientific way of thinking in general, he says.

item.title: Naasthikanaya Daivam - നാസ്തികനായ ദൈവം 2017 - Ravichandran C
item.description:
This is a presentation done by noted author and freethinker Ravichandran C at REASON'17 conducted by esSENSE, Pathanathitta unit at Town Hall, Pathanathitta on 26.2.17. Nasthikanaya Daiavam is the name of a best seller by Ravichandran C published by DC books, Kottayam in 2009 October. The Book is having the 7th edition now. It is critical study of 'the God delusion' written by Richard Dawkins and handles science, evolution, religion and philosophy from the cultural and intellectual background of the society of Kerala during the last few decades.

item.title: Science & Youth- Ravichandran C with Jeevan Job Thomas
item.description:
Noted authors and science writers Ravichandran C and Dr Jeevan Job Thomas is having a one-on- one on the topic, 'Science and The Youth of Kerala' on Feb 2, 2017 at Calicut, Kerala. This a first Public Interaction session of the Kerala Literary Festival concluded in the fisrt week of February (2-6) at Calicut Beach Kerala. The Meet was conducted by the Dept of Culture and Tourism, Government of Kerala and DC Books, Kottayam. Both the authors participated in the previous edition of KLF at the same venue in 2016 also

item.title: Is Astrology Exploitation? (Debate) Ravichandran.C V/s N.K Namboothiri സംവാദം : ജ്യോതിഷം ചൂഷണമോ ?
item.description:
Is Astrology Exploitation? (Debate) Ravichandran.C V/s N.K Namboothiri
This debate on the validity of Astrology was conducted by esSENSE, Kollam at 10 am on 1.1.2017 at Public Library Hall, Kollam. Ravichandran C, a noted Malayalam author and freethinker in Kerala argued that Astrology is sheer exploitation and waste of time based on pure religious imagination and pseudo-scientific claims.
He calls it a crime punishable by law in India, though the law is not implemented properly. There is a marked difference between astronomy and astrology. Astrologist borrowed the script provided by sky readers of the past to predict the future of human beings. Ravichandran says that such predictions can be done by use any thing. Palm, numbers, letters, betel leaf or even butts of people instead of zodiac signs! N.K Namboothiri, being himself an astrologer, claims that astrology is a divine science based on the revelations of old saints which is quite difficult to explain in limited time period of a debate. He also argues that astrology is true and scientific but very difficult to explain to the laymen. The debate was moderated by Mr Abhilash Sreedharan

item.title: Geethayanam - Ravichandran C ഗീതായനം (എന്‍.ഗോപാലകൃഷ്ണനുള്ള മറുപടി)- Reply to N Gopalakrishnan IISH
item.description:
This is a reply by noted author and freethinker Ravichandran C against a volley of you tube videos against the content and views of his books n' talks posted by noted Hindu televangelist Dr N Gopalakrishnan. The talk provides fresher insight into the theological claims regarding Hindu holy script, Bhgavat gita. The Venue of this presentation was the book release of Sri Asafali Samprayikkal (Ente Face book Postukal) at Sahithya Acdemy Hall Thrissur on 17.12.16. Conducted by esSENSE, Thrissur.

item.title: Scientific Temper and Social Reforms - Ravichandran C ശാസ്ത്രീയമനോവൃത്തിയും സാമൂഹികപരിഷ്‌ക്കാരങ്ങളും
item.description:
This is a speech made by noted author and freethinker Ravichandran C at Government College, Thavannoor at Malappuram district, Kerala on 07.12.16.
The talk titled 'Scientific Temper and Social reforms' was a part of the two day seminar on Scientific awareness conducted by the Department of Sociology of the college. Ravichandran explains how Science in it methodology and execution differs from traditional concepts of Knowledge generation. Tradition, Authority, Dogma and Revelation(TADR) were considered to be the principal sources of knowledge in the Pre Enlightenment societies world over. a priori knowledge was deemed good enough platform to construct to construct ideological castles with little empirical endorsement.
A posteriori sources begins to have the pride of place since Enlightenment in the modern world, the speaker observes. Ravichandran fielded a few questions from the students in the end.

item.title: The Neck Of Giraffe - Ravichandran C | ജിറാഫിന്റെ കഴുത്ത് - രവിചന്ദ്രന്‍ സി
item.description:
This is a presentation done by noted Malayalam author and freethinker Ravichandran C at the Department of Statistics, Cusat, Cochin, Kerala at 5 pm on 6.12.16. The giraffe's long neck can reach more than 7 feet in length, which means it makes up nearly half of its overall height. Just like humans, giraffes have seven vertebrae in their necks, but theirs — unlike ours — can each be over 10 inches long. There are a couple of theories about why giraffes have such long necks. Some scientists believe it's simply a matter of natural selection. Giraffes fight by beating each other with their heads and necks. Ravichandran also talked about the recurrent Laryngeal nerve of Giraffe to explain the modus operandi of evolution by natural selection which is blind, purposeless and sans design or direction.
**** NB- @ 52 mnts onwards-The length of Laryngeal nerve in Giraffe is about 15 feet, not 15 metres. The mistake reg unit is regretted.- esSENSE
--------------

item.title: വാക്സിന്‍: സ്വന്തം വിജയത്തിന്‍റെ ഇര? Vaccine: Victim Of Own Success?- Ravichandran C
item.description:
Noted author and freethinker Ravichandran C here talks about the pseudo scientific propaganda ploys to thwart vaccination process in the state of Kerala. He explains the blatant inconsistencies and logical fallacies in the anti-vaccine propaganda orchestrated by alternate medical practitioners and faith healers in the state of Kerala.This video contains of a full day training session cum seminar conducted by health Services Department, Government of Kerala at CHS Centre, Chennalodu, Kalpetta, Wyanad on 30.07.2016 from 10 am to 4 pm. Ravichandran also fielded questions from the trainees in the later stage of the event.

item.title: ''We are all stars''- Ravichandran C with MS Madhu
item.description:
This interview was shot on Sept 16, 2016 when Mr.Jain G Gopinath, MS Madhu, Joseph Mezhuveli, Sunil Vismaya visted noted author and freethinker Ravichandran C at his residence 'Ghaya', Pavithreswaram, Kottarakkara, Kerala.
Here, Ravichandran is interrogated on his views related to his books, atheism, Gita, Meaning of life and his postulation 'Aham drvyasmi, Tathwamasi'( I am matter, you are no different)

item.title: Velichapaadinte Bhaarya - Ravichandran C 02 October 2016 Muvattupuzha Presentation
item.description:
വെളിച്ചപ്പാടിന്റെ ഭാര്യ - രവിചന്ദ്രന്‍ സി| Velichapaadinte Bhaarya - Ravichandran C Muvattupuzha | 02 October 2016
Noted Freethinker and authour Ravichandran C is here talking about the 'Relentless Religious Radiation' (RRR) the non believers had to undergo in a traditional, religious society. The non-believers are constantly challenged by religious gravity once they rejected in the micro-macro levels of their life. He cites various examples from the lives of Rationalists come out in the public sphere in Kerala, India. Many of them were heavily traumatized by societal and family pressure and isolation tactics adopted by religion on a 24x7 basis. Religious fascism works both explicitly and implicitly. It is because of the demeaning religious gravity, problems and distrusts are created in individual families. It will be a stark misreading if one prefers to find individual reasons for this social malady, says Ravichandran. This programme was conducted by the VT Smaraka Samithi at NAS Auditorium at Muvattupuzha, Kerala on 2.10.16 at 3 pm.
We acknowledge using 3 different short Video footages under youtube fair usage policy as this talk is for nonprofit educational purposes
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~- Please watch: "ശബരിമലയിൽ സ്ത്രീകളെ പ്രവേശിപ്പിക്കണമോ ? Should Women be Allowed in Sabarimala? - Ravichandran C" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jz3zYJBOfW4 -~-~~-~~~-~~-~-

Many of them were heavily traumatized by societal and family pressure and isolation tactics adopted by religion on a 24x7 basis. Religious fascism works both explicitly and implicitly. It is because of the demeaning religious gravity, problems and distrusts are created in individual families. It will be a stark misreading if one prefers to find individual reasons for this social malady, says Ravichandran. This programme was conducted by the VT Smaraka Samithi at NAS Auditorium at Muvattupuzha, Kerala on 2.10.16 at 3 pm.
We acknowledge using 3 different short Video footages under youtube fair usage policy as this talk is for nonprofit educational purposes
